Class Reader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Reader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Reader
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class is the Reader thread. It's for the listening on the multicastport you gave him from the constructor.
    Version:
    03-14-2013
    Author:
    AHMED ALY, Alexander Rieppel
